name: Tabnine
description: Tabnine is an AI-powered code assistant that accelerates software development while prioritizing code privacy and security.
longDescription: Tabnine is an AI-driven coding assistant designed to enhance developer productivity by providing intelligent code completions, suggestions, and automation tools across various programming languages and IDEs. Its mission is to streamline the software development lifecycle by offering personalized, context-aware recommendations that align with a team’s coding standards. Tabnine ensures code privacy through end-to-end encryption, zero data retention, and flexible deployment options, including fully air-gapped environments for sensitive projects. By integrating with tools like GitHub, GitLab, and Jira, it supports developers in generating code, writing tests, creating documentation, and conducting code reviews. The platform caters to individual developers, teams, and enterprises, emphasizing security, compliance, and efficiency. Since its launch in 2018, Tabnine has been a pioneer in AI-assisted software development, trusted by millions of developers worldwide.
features: Tabnine provides AI-powered code completions that predict and suggest code based on context, reducing typing and errors.
It integrates with popular IDEs like VS Code and JetBrains, delivering seamless in-editor suggestions for enhanced workflow.
The platform supports all major programming languages, including Python, JavaScript, Java, C++, and more, ensuring broad applicability.
Tabnine’s Code Review Agent validates code against team standards, offering fixes to improve quality and security.
It generates comprehensive test plans and detailed test cases based on existing codebase standards, streamlining testing processes.
Tabnine’s Jira integration autonomously generates code from requirements in Jira issues, speeding up development cycles.
The platform offers natural language code explanations, simplifying onboarding and maintenance for unfamiliar projects.
It supports air-gapped deployments, ensuring maximum privacy and security for sensitive codebases.
Tabnine’s Team Learning Algorithm personalizes suggestions by learning from team-specific coding patterns and repositories.
The AI creates documentation, including API guides and inline comments, enhancing code readability and maintainability.
Tabnine ensures code privacy with end-to-end encryption and zero data retention, protecting intellectual property.
It provides customizable AI models, allowing users to fine-tune or select third-party LLMs for specific needs.
The Code Provenance feature flags AI-generated code against public repositories, reducing IP liability risks.

faqs.question: What is Tabnine used for?
faqs.answer: Tabnine is an AI coding assistant that accelerates software development by providing code completions, generating tests, creating documentation, and validating code.

faqs.question: Does Tabnine support my IDE?
faqs.answer: Tabnine integrates with popular IDEs like Visual Studio Code, JetBrains, and others, with support for additional IDEs available upon request.

faqs.question: Is Tabnine safe for proprietary code?
faqs.answer: Yes, Tabnine ensures code safety with end-to-end encryption, zero data retention, and air-gapped deployment options for maximum privacy.

faqs.question: Can Tabnine generate code from Jira issues?
faqs.answer: Tabnine’s AI agents can generate and validate code based on requirements in Jira issues, streamlining development workflows.

faqs.question: Does Tabnine offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, Tabnine provides a free version with limited features and a 90-day free trial of Tabnine Pro for extended functionality.

faqs.question: How does Tabnine ensure code quality?
faqs.answer: Tabnine’s Code Review Agent checks code against team standards and best practices, offering suggestions to improve quality and security.

faqs.question: Can Tabnine be deployed on-premises?
faqs.answer: Yes, Tabnine supports on-premises, VPC, and air-gapped deployments to meet enterprise security and privacy needs.

faqs.question: Does Tabnine support all programming languages?
faqs.answer: Tabnine supports a wide range of languages, including Python, JavaScript, Java, C++, PHP, Go, and many others.

faqs.question: How does Tabnine handle data privacy?
faqs.answer: Tabnine uses proprietary models, never stores or shares code, and complies with international data privacy standards.

faqs.question: Can Tabnine learn from my codebase?
faqs.answer: Yes, Tabnine’s Team Learning Algorithm adapts to your codebase and repositories, providing personalized code suggestions.
